EmailTemplate.subject: Ffreedom Membership Yearly Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name},
Our continuous endeavor is to help you live your dreams & achieve financial freedom.
To begin with, we would like to thank you for placing your trust with us for nearly a year now. We immensely appreciate your continued support & journey with us.
Over this last year we have tried to help you manage your finances in the best possible manner. We are sure you are on track towards achieving your financial goals.
At this point we would like to inform you that the annual review of your financial plan is due, where we shall review you portfolio along with your goals. Through this session, we will also take the opportunity of gathering fresh data, if any [in terms of goals, income flows etc.] Post this, your Financial Plan will be restructured & rebalanced as necessary.
We would also like to inform you that your membership fee [invoice attached] is due. Please act upon the same, so that you continue to avail the following services:
Dedicated Certified Financial Planner [CFP] o Conference calls/meetings at your discretion with your Financial Plannero Single point contact [who will act as a coach] for any queries
Restructuring of the plan, if required, due to changes in personal circumstances Access to Member portal o will help in Consolidation & tracking
Implementation o Ffreedom team will help you to execute every single action plan o Help get the best possible rates,wherever possible Reviews o Ongoing Review o Annual review
Other Services o Monthly statements & updates on your Financial Plan o Ffreedom Team proactively interacting with you on an ongoing basiso SIP & Premium reminders o You will be part of our weekly update & monthly Commentary mailers [to keep you updated on the environment]
Additional Offerings [at an extra price] o Estate Planning o Income Tax Filing
Your Financial Planner will soon be in touch with you to take these forward.
Please ignore, if already acted upon.
Warm Regards, Ffreedom Team
